attributes.action: Base the Benefit System on choice, ie. if you have a choice you get no Benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For example, people choose to have children or choose to come to this country. Where a free choice is involved it is illogical that anyone should receive a Benefit. In situations where people have no choice, ie old age, genuine unemployment or disability then they should receive a generous benefit.
Announcing that Child Benefit would cease for all children born 9 months from now would be a huge step in improving parenting. It would ensure that children were born for the right reasons and not for the Benefits they attract. They would be loved and cared for. It would address most of our social ills, from bullying to Baby P, from littering to knife crime our society would be transformed.
